text: Siboney may refer to: ==Arts== * Siboney (film), a Mexican-Cuban drama film * "Siboney" (song), a 1929 song by Ernesto Lecuona * Siboney, a 1985 album by Slim Gaillard ==Places== * Siboney, Cuba, a town in eastern Cuba * Siboney, Oklahoma, a town absorbed by the town of Manitou, Oklahoma * Siboney, a neighborhood in Playa, Havana in Cuba ==Other uses== * The Ciboney or Siboney, an indigenous people of Cuba * Siboney (rum), a brand of rums * Siboney de Cuba, a cattle breed * , two U.S. Navy ships of the name
title: Siboney
